pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Tabler' API for 'Shiny' // 'R' interface to the 'Tabler' HTML template. See more here https://tabler.io. 'tablerDash' is a light 'Bootstrap 4' dashboard template. There are different layouts available such as a one page dashboard or a multi page template, where the navigation menu is contained in the navigation bar.
